paper.title: Combining ICA with Kernel Based Regressions for Trading Support Systems on Financial Options
paper.abstract: Options are highly non-linear and complicated products in financial markets. Owing to the high risk associated with option trading, investment on options is a knowledge-intensive industry. This study develops a novel decision support system for option trading. In the first stage, independent component analysis (ICA) is employed to uncover the independent hidden forces of the stock market that drive the price movement of an option. In the second stage, a dynamic kernel predictors are constructed for trading decisions. Comparing with convectional feature extractions and pure regression models, the performance improvement of the new method is significant and robust. The cumulated trading profits are substantialy increased. The resultant intelligent investment decision support system can help investors, fund managers and investment decision-makers make profitable decisions.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是开发一个用于期权交易的决策支持系统，通过独立成分分析(ICA)和动态核预测器来揭示驱动期权价格变动的市场因素并做出交易决策。这直接涉及期权（一种衍生品）的价格分析和交易策略，属于衍生品定价的范畴。
